author: Saif Al-Farai

text: Agreed. I understand that people like Adventure 1 better, but to me I liked Unleashed SO MUCH more, it was actually FUN to explore the hubs in Unleashed. You also bring up a good point, people say they don't like Unleashed because half the game is not "true sonic" yet they love Adventure 1 where 5/6 of the game is not "true sonic." Bunch of hypocrites I swear. XP
author: Pets Play

text:
"Ignoring Big."  You said it yourself, there's a NECESSARY COMPONENT of Sonic Adventure that sucks.

Plus, SU has decent voice-acting in the cutscenes, no stupid treasure hunts in the main story, and a decent system.  The only downside is the whole let's-make-WereSonic-walk-down-a-million-balance-beams thing.
author: The_L1985

text:
I was going to put some more of the awesome music from the first two games, but Ehal256 mentioned Sonic 3 and I ran with it.  Sonic CD has some great music as well.

S&K didn't have MJ's music.  The pedo case happened just before s3 was released, so Sonic Team dropped MJ for good about the same time. S&K's music is all Sonic Team.

That's also why the "Come On" boss music isn't in lock-on or S&K.
author: The_L1985

text:
I'm thinking EC: NYC
Apotos: Greece
Spagonia: Western Europe
Holoska: Polar regions/Russia
Mazuri: Sub-Saharan Africa
Shamar: Middle East
Adabat: Indonesia (seconded by my bro, who's been to Indonesia)
Chun-nan: China.
author: The_L1985

text: Sorry, but the existence of Big the Cat, and the horrible voice acting, kind of killed it for me.  Plus the treasure hunting missions.  I'm sorry, but hunting for items should be relegated to optional side-quests, not made a vital part of the game!  It's Sonic.  It's about rushing through at high speed!
author: The_L1985

text: I'll +1 it for saying Unleashed is good, because it is. (360/PS3 version anyway.) But Sonic Adventure series has always been one of his better games aside from Sonic 3 & Knuckles.
author: TB Ninja

text: I consider Sonic Unleashed to be a good Sonic game.  Not as good as the originals, certainly, but it makes Sonic Adventure look like the sorry joke that it is.
author: The_L1985

text:
Angel Island Zone
Ice Cap Zone
Launch Base Zone
Flying Battery Zone
Sandopolis Zone
"Come on" Boss Theme
Knuckles's Theme (S&K version)
Boss--Death Egg Zone
Doomsday Zone

Look those up some time.  The music kicked ass.

Also, Scrap Brain Zone, from the original Sonic, is pretty good techno, but it does tend to get stuck in your head.
author: The_L1985

text:
Not nearly as good as the Genesis games, but still WAY better than the swill Sonic Team's been peddling for the past decade.  If you have a Wii, do yourself a favor and get the Wii version--the controls aren't retardedly loose in that one.

Be warned--it is addictive.
author: The_L1985
